website_summaries.verdict: Excellent base for sensitive skin that brightens and holds eyeshadow.
pros: Keeps makeup in place all day
Works well at preventing creases in eyeliner
Good texture that doesn’t cake the shadow
cons: Not much product for the money
Some users think it is too runny

customer_reviews.title: awesome stuff!
customer_reviews.text: eyeliner kept smudging on my hooded eyelids by the afternoon. decided to try eyelid primer, and i am so glad i did. it worked! it's nighttime now, and all of my eye makeup including liquid eyeliner is still completely there. And my eyes aren't stinging from the oils. when i put on the makeup over the primer, it was a different experience. like drawing on matte finish, like paper.
customer_reviews.author: G Gris

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love this stuff !!! I ran out and was not able to wear eye shadow at all until I ordered more. If you have trouble with your eye shadow creasing due to oily skin, This is just what you need. My mom got me hooked on this a couple of years ago and now if I don't have any primer I just don't wear eye shadow
customer_reviews.author: Chandra Deas

customer_reviews.title: Best primer for oily eyelids
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for over 10 years, can’t find anything better. I’ve tried the colored versions and they were a fail. This makes my cake eyeliner stay put, and stops my hooded eyelids from picking up my mascara.
customer_reviews.author: MyB

customer_reviews.title: Primer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent primer, does not crease! Even keeps eyeliner from spreading into creases....
customer_reviews.author: Linda Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Only one I use cause it works! Eyeshadow stays put so all I could ask for.
customer_reviews.author: Cathi

customer_reviews.title: Not much for concealing
customer_reviews.text: This is s very small tube. Almost sample sized. The cream is slightly tinted, but does nothing to conceal redness. Not sure of the point. Eyeshadow goes on as usual.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L.

customer_reviews.title: Best Eyelid Primer!
customer_reviews.text: This is the very best eyelid primer that I have ever used. Keeps your eye makeup in place all day!
customer_reviews.author: KATHERINE A RADICAN

customer_reviews.title: Gentle to the eyes
customer_reviews.text: This eyeshadow primer works great. Keeps the eyeshadow on all day and is very gentle.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my eyeliner in place all day
customer_reviews.text: So easy to apply and makes my eyeliner last all day. Even if i have no makeup, just putting this on makes me look better.
customer_reviews.author: Analu2020

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I've found for eyelids to keep from smearing
customer_reviews.author: janet slick

customer_reviews.title: VERY HAPPY WITH
customer_reviews.text: BEEN USING THIS PRODUCT FOR YEARS. VERY HAPPY WITH IT
customer_reviews.author: Jean Paruolo

customer_reviews.title: Tube falls apart immediately
customer_reviews.text: Love the primer hate the manufacturer! This is the THIRD time the tube has broken on me. Although this time, it was brand new and only second time I used. I bought it in May! Bare Minerals would not refund or send new one since I bought on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Horowitz

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get your hopes up
customer_reviews.text: What a joke. $18 for the smallest tube of product I’ve ever seen in my entire life. Will definitely not be buying again. What a rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. The only primer that I haven't had an allergic reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy Lou

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: This product turns into tiny flakes on the eyelid and is not a pretty sight by the end of the day under eyeshadow.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: A long-lasting matte finish
customer_reviews.text: I started using this when I had read a review on a different website stating it's good for oily eyelids, which I was prone to. I used to use Smashbox lid primer, but it didn't always stay on. The Bare Minerals eyelid primer does.
customer_reviews.author: W. Pereira-Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Top Performer!
customer_reviews.text: Love the tinted primer that gets my eye makeup to STAY PUT, even on the humid days.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Greco

customer_reviews.title: Helps with smuggling but NOT all day
customer_reviews.text: Works OK but not as good as a tube of the same product a friend gave me about 3 years ago! It definitely helps reduce smuggling but not all day for me😒
customer_reviews.author: Mama2001

customer_reviews.title: Made lids dry
customer_reviews.text: it felt oily when applied, but made my lids very dry
customer_reviews.author: DPK

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday under my eyeshadow and sometimes alone.
customer_reviews.author: gh

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: I love Bare minerals, but this product failed! I used it and it turned cakey and dry on my eyelids and made applying my eyeshadow a mess! Do not buy this !!
customer_reviews.author: Corrine Jones

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t heard any complaints from my wife. So it must be good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My eye makeup is much less likely to crease in the lid fold when I use this.
customer_reviews.author: ski

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It saved my eyelids from looking tired after just a few hours of wearing makeup. Wish I would have been using it for years!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany J Austin

customer_reviews.title: Really keeps the eye shadow in place and prevents creasing
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this primer for many years. Its great and does the job in keeping eye shadowing from creasing. Also doesn't change the color or tint the shadow I'm using on any given day.
customer_reviews.author: Dee M.

product_meta.title: Bare Minerals Escentuals Prime Time Eyelid Primer for Women, 0.10 Oz
product_meta.description: An essential for maximizing color intensity, our Prime Time Eyelid Primer provides the perfect base for your favorite bareMinerals eyeshadows. It's designed to combat creasing and color fading to help ensure your eye looks are smooth and long lasting.
feature_bullets: Works overtime so that you enjoy vibrant, lasting eye color
Combats excess oil so that your eyelids don't look greasy
Perfect for when you need all day, all night staying power
Country of origin is United States
